loans.name: Maria Angela

texts.es:
Doña María, tiene 44 años D. edad, resiD. en San Miguel departamento D. San Miguel, donD. vive con su familia y dos hijos D. 21 y 18 años D. edad, estos estudian en la Universidad, doña María administra una tienda, este negocio lo atienD. D. 7 D. la mañana a 6 D. la tarD., por las tardes también venD. ropa y uno D. sus hijos le ayuda a vender.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para invertirlo en el negocio, comprando mercadería y ropa, la intención D. ella es fortalecer el negocio, brindar a los clientes todo lo necesario para el hogar y prendas D. vestir que se ajusten a las necesidades D. la clientela.
El objetivo D. doña María es tener una fuente D. ingreso estable para poder ayudar a sus hijos en sus estudios y que se gradúen pronto.
texts.en: María is 44 years old and lives in the town of San Miguel, department of San Miguel, with her family and her two children, ages 21 and 18, who are studying at the university. María runs a store and tends to this business from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. In the afternoons she also sells clothing, and one of her children helps her with the sales. María is requesting the loan to invest in her business by purchasing merchandise and clothing. This will strengthen her business by providing her customers with products and clothing to fit their every need. María's goal is to have a stable source of income to be able to help with her children's education and for them to graduate soon.

loans.use: Purchase clothing and supplies

loans.name: Pablo De Los Milagros

texts.es:
Pablo tiene 33 años de edad, es soltero y reside en el caserío La Estancia; que se encuentra ubicado en el  distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola bastante comercial que pertenece a la provincia de Lambayeque y se encuentra situada a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo.

Pablo se dedica hace dos años a la compra y venta de  ganado ovino y caprino, los cuales cría en un  ambiente cerca de su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. Con los ingresos que percibe de esta actividad ayuda a su familia.

Pablo desea ampliar su negocio comprando más animales y alimento balanceado de modo que pueda aumentar sus ventas debido al aumento de la demanda. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.
texts.en: Pablo is 33 years old, single and lives in the village of La Estancia, located in the district of Olmos, a rather commercial agricultural area in the province of Lambayeque that's located an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo. Pablo has made a living for the past two years buying and selling sheep and goats, which he raises on land near his home. When the animals reach a good level of development he sells them to the general public and to the businessmen who frequent the area. He helps his family with the income from this activity. Pablo wishes to expand his business by purchasing more animals as well as balanced feed so he can increase his sales to go with the increased demand. To do that, he is requesting a loan of 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: Purchase livestock and feed

loans.name: Vidal

texts.es:
Don Vidal, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, tiene 42 años de edad, se dedica al cultivo de maíz, frijol y la crianza de cerdos, vive con su esposa y sus hijos que son cuatro de 12, 14, 17 y 19 años de edad, don Vidal se dedica a la siembra de frijol y maíz, también a la crianza de cerdos desde hace 10 años, el comercializa en el tiangue de Corinto los días miércoles  y Domingos.
El está solicitando un préstamo para comprar cerdos y alimento para engordarlos, este préstamo le ayudara a realizar una buena inversión que en un futuro le generara ganancias para su propia vida. El sueño de él es comprar un terreno amplio donde pueda cultivar maíz y frijol, también trabajar por el desarrollo de sus hijos en la educación.
texts.en:
Mr. Vidal is 42 years old and lives in the Corinto department of Morazán. He cultivates corn and beans, and raises pigs. He lives with his wife and his four children of 12, 14, 17, and 19 years of age. Mr. Vidal has planted beans and corn, as well as raising pigs, for the last 10 years. He markets them in Corinto's small market on Wednesdays and Sundays.
He is requesting a loan to buy pigs and feed to fatten them. This loan will help him make a good investment which will generate earnings for him in the future. His dream is to buy a large plot of land where he can cultivate corn and beans, and also to work for the development of his childrens' education.

loans.use: Purchase of pigs and feed (concentrated)

loans.name: Fatima Del Rosario

texts.es: Fátima Del Rosario tiene 28 años, ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 2 años que inicio este negocio, a pesar de no tener mucha experiencia es una persona que ha sabido salir adelante. Tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, ella estudio administración de empresas pero al  no tener un empleo, decide iniciar su propio negocio. Ella solicita este financiamiento para capital de trabajo y aumentar su inventario. Su deseo es seguir obteniendo más ganancias para mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en: Fátima Del Rosario is 28 years old, she sells general goods. She started this business more than 2 years ago, and despite not having much experience she is a person who knows how to get ahead. She has 2 young children in her care. She studied business admininstration but as she did not have a job, she decided to start her own business. She is requesting this financing for working capital and to increase her stock. Her wish is to keep earning more profits to improve her home.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
Jose Luís vive en casa de sus padres,en la zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz; al lograr la mayoría de edad le dieron unos ambientes que están construidas en obra gruesa, para que Jose Luís pueda terminarlas y formar su propio hogar, el crédito será destinado para la compra de material, para la obra fina de las habitaciones donde vive. 
Jose Luis trabaja para la Policia Boliviana, es soltero.
Es el cuarto crédito con IMPRO y el análsis socio económico indica que es sujeto de crédito y tiene un historial de pagos muy bueno.
texts.en: Jose Luís lives in his parents' home in the Pasankeri area of the city of La Paz. When he became an adult they gave him some land under heavy construction so that he could finish the work and have his own home. He plans to use the loan to purchase materials to do finish work on his home. Jose Luís works for the Bolivian police and is single. This is his fourth loan with Kiva partner IMPRO, and the socioeconomic analysis indicates he's a good loan recipient and he has a good payment history.

loans.use: Finish work on his home

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila tiene 40 años de edad, reside junto a sus dos hijos en el distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola de bastante movimiento comercial conocida como la capital del limón; que se encuentra situada en la provincia de Lambayeque, a más de una hora y media de la ciudad de Chiclayo. 

Ella se dedica hace 10 años a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno; ella cría  a su ganado en un ambiente cercano a su domicilio, cuando estos ya han alcanzado un buen nivel de desarrollo los ofrece en venta al público en general y a los negociantes que suelen visitar la zona. Adicionalmente se dedica a la agricultura. Con el ingreso q ella percibe de estas actividades se encarga de sacar adelante a sus hijos.

Lucila desea ampliar su negocio comprando más ganado y ofrecerlo a buen precio asimismo poder incrementar sus ventas. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Lucila es una madre de familia responsable y activa que desea brindar a sus hijos una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Lucila is 40 years old and lives with her two children in the district of Olmos.  It is an agricultural area with considerable trade and is known as the lemon capital.  It is located in the province of Lambayeque, an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

She has been raising and selling cattle for 10 years.  She cares for her livestock in a location close to her home.  Once they are fully grown she sells them to the general public or merchants who visit the area.  She also is involved in farming.  Her business provides an income for her children.

Lucila wants to expand her business by buying more livestock so she can lower her prices and increase sales.  She has requested a loan for 1000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa.

She is a responsible, active mother who wants to give her children the best quality of life.

loans.use: To buy more livestock to expand business

loans.name: Cristobal

texts.es: Cristobal, de 46 años, es separado y muy responsable con sus deberes de padre, por ello  vive en su casa propia en compañía de su hijo. Desde muy joven trabajó en diversos oficios, y desde hace 13 años se dedica al oficio de taxista, contando con su propio vehículo, desde entonces se ha convertido en su única fuente de ingresos económicos. Es así que todos los días trabaja desde muy temprano hasta altas horas de la noche, de esa manera puede cubrir con la educación de su hijo, así como terminar de construir su casa. Por ello se siente muy  contento con su labor, a pesar de los peligroso que es exponerse de noche, además que dentro de esta actividad lo realiza de manera independiente.  Este emprendedor hombre, está convencido que trabajando arduamente y más la ayuda de ustedes él podrá terminar de construir su casa y ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida de su hijo, además de ayudar a completar su educación. Este es el segundo crédito  que tiene con MFP, donde es un asiduo e incansable trabajador,  por ello dice “que con confíen en él y estén seguros que pagará todas sus cuotas puntualmente”. Por ello con el crédito que solicita,  comprará ventanas y puertas, para mandar a poner en su casa, y con el resto del crédito lo invertirá en el mantenimiento de su carro.
texts.en:
Cristobal is 46 years old, separated and a very responsible father.  He lives with his son in his own home.  From a very early age he has worked in several different jobs.  For 13 years now he has been a taxi driver and uses his own automobile.  This is the only source of income he has.  Every day he begins work very early in the morning and does not finish until late at night.  In this manner he can provide an education for his son and also finish building his house.

He is very satisfied with his job despite the perils of working at night and the fact that he works alone.  This entrepreneur is convinced that working hard and with your help he will be able to finish his house and provide a better quality of life for his son and help him finish his education.  This is his second loan through MFP where he is a constant and indefatigable worker.  He says "to trust him and rest assured that he will pay back the loan on time".  He plans to use the loan to buy windows and doors for his house and the rest for maintenance of his automobile.

loans.use: To buy doors and windows for his house and repair parts for his automobile

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy medicine

loans.name: Amalia

texts.es:
Amalia vive en alquiler con su hija, en la zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz; el costo del alquiler de la casa donde vive es alto y el trasladarse de casa en casa por cambiar de sitio de alquiler ocasiona que deteriore sus pertenencias, es por ello que necesita una vivienda en anticretico pues en ella encontrara mayor estabilidad y su gasto se reducirá considerablemente, además que podrá ahorrar.
Amalia es contadora, con el crédito ella podrá obtener un anticretico ( anticrético es una forma legal de vivir en un departamento, habitación o casa, medante un acuerdo con el dueño de casa, por un tiempo dfinido al término del cual, el dueño de casa devuelve el dinero al inquilino), y así mejorar las condiciones de vida.  
Es el primer crédito con IMPRO.
texts.en:
Amalia lives with her daughter in a rental property in the Pasankeri area in the city of La Paz.  The rent she pays is very high and having to move from rental place to rental place takes a toll on her belongings.  She needs to acquire usufruct rights so she can live somewhere with more stability and which will allow her to reduce her expenses considerably so she can save.

Amalia is an accountant.  She plans to use the loan to obtain usufruct rights (usufruct is a legal form of living in an apartment, room or house through an agreement with the landlord for a defined period of time at the end of which the landlord will return the money to the usufructor), in order to improve living conditions.

This is her first loan through IMPRO.

loans.use: To cover usufruct costs so she can move into a more comfortable home

loans.name: Vicenta

texts.es:
Doña Vicenta, tiene 39 años de edad, reside en San Isidro, departamento de Morazán, administra un cafetín, su familia la conforman: su esposo, tres hijas de 18, 15 y 8 años de edad.
Doña Vicenta se dedica al cafetín hace 9 años, lo tiene ubicado en su propia casa, ofrece comida, bebidas, panes, entre otros alimentos, sus clientes son vecinos y amigos cercanos, estudiantes que circulan por el lugar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para comprar pan, carnes, café, azúcar, arroz y condimentos, entre otros que tienen demanda como las sodas, jugos. Este préstamo le ayudara a mantenerse estable en el negocio, vera la oportunidad de producir más y tener mejores ventas.
Su sueño es en un futuro ampliar su vivienda, para que su familia se sienta más cómoda, también quiere crecer con el negocio para tener un ingreso constante para ayudar a sus hijas a realizarse como profesionales.
texts.en:
Doña vicenta is 39 years old and lives in San Isidro in the department of Morazán.  She runs a small coffee stand. She has a husband and three daughters, ages 18, 15 and 8.  Doña Vicente has been running her stand for 9 years out of her own home.  She sells food, drinks, bread and other food items.  Her customers are her neighbors and close friends and the students who pass through the location.

She is requesting a loan to buy bread, meat, coffee, sugar, rice and condiments and other items on demand such as sodas and juices.  This loan will help her keep her business running smoothly, allowing her to produce and sell more.  Her dream is to expand her house so her family can live more comfortably.  She also wants to grow her business to have a stable income to help her daughters become professional workers.

loans.use: To buy bread, meat, coffee, sugar, rice and condiments

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es: Hilda, es una mujer decidida y hábil, de 45. Es separada y vive en compañía en su hijo Jimmy, de 21 años, en casa de sus padres. Desde hace un año, se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles en una bodega que posee, situado en la casa de su madre y para lograrlo compra mercadería como: arroz, azúcar, aceites y entre otros  productos básicos al por mayor, en un emporio comercial de Lima. Prioriza los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, de este modo su negocio es la más preferida de su barrio, por tanto se muestra satisfecha por el trabajo que realiza, puesto que no tiene horario y no depende de nadie, lo que le permite dedicarse también a sus labores domesticas. Por otro lado, también tiene un negocio adicional, que es la venta de helados, hecho a base de frutas licuadas, ofertándolo a solo S/. 0.30 y S/.0.50 céntimos, de ese modo su negocio le resulta muy rentable. Por ello en adelante piensa ampliar e incrementar  su bodega con más productos, pero al contado y de ese modo acumular un poco más de sus ganancias. Ella pertenece a un pequeño grupo comunal, y está es la segunda vez que trabaja con MFP, demostrando compromiso y éxito con los integrantes de su asociación. Hilda, cada mes compra la mercadería necesaria para su negocio, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará  gaseosas y cervezas.
texts.en:
Hilda is a determined, skillful woman who is 45 years old.  She is separated and lives in her parents' home with her son Jimmy who is 21 years old.  For a year now she has been selling groceries out of a store she has in her mother's home.  She buys wholesale items such as rice, sugar, oil and other basic products at the emporium in Lima.  She makes her purchases based on the priorities of her customers and so her store is the most popular in the neighborhood.  She is very happy with her job since she has no real working hours and is not dependent on anyone, so is also able to take care of household chores.

She also sells ice cream made from liquified fruit for only PEN 0.30 and 0.50 cents, so her business is even more profitable.  She plans to increase her stock buying more products for the store so she can increase earnings.  She belongs to a small communal bank.  This is her second loan through MFP.  She has always been committed to the members of the association.  Every month Hilda buys the goods she needs for her business.  She plans to use this loan to buy softdrinks and beer.

loans.use: To buy softdrinks and beer

loans.name: Teresa Del Pilar

texts.es:
Teresa es una madre D. familia D. 53 años D. edad;  que resiD. en el distrito D. Olmos, una zona agrícola bastante comercial, conocida como la capital del limón; que pertenece a la provincia D. Lambayeque y se encuentra situada a más D. una hora y media D. la ciudad D. Chiclayo.

Teresa se dedica a la preparación y venta D. alimentos desD. hace siete años, ella prepara sus alimentos en su domicilio para luego ofrecerlos en venta en el interior del mercado D. Olmos. El negocio goza D. muy buena acogida por parte D. sus clientes debido a la buena sazón con la que prepara su comida. Teresa se vale D. los ingresos que recibe D. esta actividad para ayudar a su esposo a solventar la economía D. su familia.

Teresa desea ampliar su negocio con la compra D. insumos y utensilios que le permitan ampliar su producción y aumentar sus ventas, por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2000 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Teresa is a 53 year old mother, residing in the mostly commercial farming district of Olmos - known as the lemon capital - which is part of the Lambayeque province, just over an hour and a half from the city of Chiclayo.

For the last 7 years, Teresa has worked preparing food at home and later selling it within the Olmos market. Her business is warmly received by her clients as she has a real flair for cooking. Teresa uses the profits that she receives from this work to help her husband settle their family's living expenses.

Teresa wishes to expand her business with the purchase of supplies and utensils which will allow her to increase her production and sales. Consequently, she thought it best to apply to Edpyme Alternativa for a S/2000 (Nuevos Soles) loan.

loans.use: To purchase supplies and utensils

loans.name: Javier

texts.es:
Javier es rentista; vive en la zona de Tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz. Su vivienda tiene una habitación que funciona como sala, pero con el crecimiento de su familia y el espacio reducido en su vivienda necesita la división de esa habitación para habilitarla para sus hijos; vive en casa propia. Con el dinero del crédito comprara material de construcción, ladrillo, cemento, estuco para dividir la habitación. Esto para mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia..  
Es el cuarto crédito con IMPRO.
texts.en: Javier lives on income he makes from renting out property.  He lives in Tacagua neighborhood, in the city of La Paz .  His home has a room that is currently used as a living room but with the growth of his family and the reduced space in his home, he needs to divide this room up so that his children can live in it.  Javier owns his own home.  He will use his loan money to buy building supplies, cement and stucco (render) to divide the room.  This will improve the living conditions of his family.  This is Javier's fourth loan with IMPRO.

loans.use: To buy materials to divide up a room in his home so that his children can live more comfortably

loans.name: Christine

texts.en: Christine is a 40-year-old married lady and a mother of three.  She owns and runs a retail shop so as to earn a living.  Besides that, she makes and sells detergents.  She also sells tea leaves for extra income.  She is looking forward to opening other outlets for her business in the future.  She is very grateful to Faulu Kenya for helping her to grow her business through loans.  Currently, she wants to open a mobile-phone money transfer business.  For this reason, she requested 60,000 Kenyan shillings.

loans.use: To open a mobile-phone money transfer business

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer tiene 29 años de edad, es casado y reside junto a su esposa y a su hija en el caserío San Pedrillo, una zona rural de la localidad de Tambogrande, un distrito agrícola que se encuentra situado en la región Piura, a más de cuatro horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Wilmer se dedica a la agricultura desde hace más de cinco años, él siembra maracuyá, limón y mango en un pequeño terreno de cultivo que es de propiedad de su esposa, los frutos de limón y maracuyá los cosecha semanalmente. Su esposa lo ayuda en algunas labores de la siembra. Con los ingresos que percibe solventa los gastos económicos de su familia. 

Wilmer desea adquirir fertilizantes y pesticidas para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de mango, maracuyá y limón; él espera obtener una buena cosecha. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles.

Wilmer es una persona bastante tranquila y responsable. Su mayor anhelo es poder crecer como empresario y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Wilmer is 29 years old, married, and lives together with his wife and daughter in the village of San Pedrillo.  This is a rural area of Tambogrande, an agricultural district which is located in Piura region, M. than four hours from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

Wilmer has been farming for M. than five years.  He grows passion fruit, lemons and mangos on a small plot of land that his wife owns.  He harvests his lemons and passion fruit every week.  His wife helps him with some of his tasks.  He uses the income from his work to cover his family's financial expenses.

Wilmer would like to buy fertilizers and pesticides to maintain his mango, passion fruit and lemon crops.  He hopes to obtain a good harvest.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,000 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

Wilmer is quite a calm and responsible person.  His biggest wish is to grow as a businessman and get ahead in life.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides for his crops

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es: Lucia, de 54 años, vive en su casa propia a lado de su esposo Ermes de 59 años, y su hijo Elar de 17 años, de los 4 que tiene en total. Hace más de 8 años esta trabajadora mujer se dedica a la venta de productos comestibles, en su bodega situado en el primer ambiente de su casa. En este negocio vende de todo, como verduras, frutas, lácteos, productos comestibles de toda la variedades y licores. Siendo así el negocio más concurrido de su barrio y, por eso durante la mañana termina muy agotada su labor,  por lo que algunas veces su hijo la apoya. Esta muy satisfecha por su negocio y las utilidades que le genera, ya que con esas ganancias de a poco fue construyendo su casa. Con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación sabe que podrá ampliar su negocio y brindar su educación superior a su hijo, así mismo terminar de construir su casa con sus respectivos acabados y de ese modo vivir una vida más placentera. Es el 16avo crédito que tiene con MFP, y promete pagar puntualmente sus cuotas, pues no quiere defraudar a todas las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Lucia, tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de mercadería que necesita para abastecer su negocio de comestibles, pues quiere ofrecer lo mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en: Lucia is 54 years old. She lives in her own house with her husband Ermes, who is 59, and their son Elar, who is 17, of the 4 children they have in total. For more than 8 years, this hardworking woman has been selling food products in her store located on the first floor of her house.  She sells everything in her business, such as vegetables, fruits, dairy products of all types, and liquor. Her business is the most popular one in her neighborhood and that is why in the morning she is very tired when she finishes her work. Sometimes, her son helps her. She is very satisfied with her business and the profits it generates her, since she built her house with the profits. With a lot of hard work and dedication she knows she can grow her business and offer a college education to her son, as well as finish building her house and thus live more pleasantly. This is the 16th loan that she has had with MFP, and she promises to make her payments on time.  She does not want to defraud all the people who made this contribution possible, which will allow her to continue working to seek progress. Lucia plans on investing the loan she has asked for in buying merchandise she needs to supply her business, since she wants to offer the best to her customers.

loans.use: To buy a variety of products to supply her store.

loans.name: Angela Del Carmen

texts.es: Ángela Del Carmen tiene 50  años, es casada y tiene 2 hijos y solamente 1 está a su cargo. La señora se dedica al negocio de compra y venta de cosméticos, desde hace 3 años que tiene este negocio este medio de vida surgió con el objetivo de generar ingresos a su hogar, ella tiene que levantarse todos los días temprano desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 10 de la noche para ofrecer los productos, necesarios. Ella actualmente está solicitando un crédito en Fundación León 2000 para ser invertido en la compra de lápiz labial, pintura de uñas, brillos entre otras cosas. Actualmente posee bastantes pedidos. Su sueño siempre ha sido llegar a tener una tienda grande ubicada en el nuevo mercado.
texts.en:
Ángela Del Carmen is 50 years old, married and has two children, one of whom is still in her care.  Her business is buying and selling cosmetics.  She has been in this business for 3 years.  She started out with the goal of making income for her household.  She has to get up early every morning and works from 7.00am to 10.00pm selling her products.

Ángela is currently requesting a loan from Fundación León 2000 to invest in buying lipsticks, nail polish, lip gloss, etc.  She currently has quite a few orders.  Her dream has always been to own a large store in the new market.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Hernan

texts.es:
HERNAN es rentista jubilado hace ya seis años, también realiza el apoyo de tramites de jubilación a ex compañeros de trabajo y demás personas. Estos trámites lo va realizando ya hace tres años, es así como obtiene sus ingresos extras para su hogar. El señor Hernán es soltero y no tiene hijos,  Vive en casa de su hermano mayor, el va apoyando en los gastos de luz eléctrica y de agua potable, ya hace mucho tiempo, la casa esta ubicada en la zona de Ernesto Torrez de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo utilizara para la refacción de la vivienda específicamente en el techo puesto que tiene goteras. Y así mejorar su forma de vida y la de su hermano.
Es su primer crédito y el análisis socioeconómico realizado lo califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
HERNAN is a retired 'rentier' (he lived on income made from investments or property).  He has been retired for six years.  He also helps ex- work colleagues and other people with retirement paperwork and proceedings.  He has been doing this for three years and it is how he makes additional income for his household.  Hernán is single and doesn't have any children.  He lives in his older brother's house and helps him cover electricity and water expenses.  He has lived there for a long time.  The house is located in Ernesto Torrez neighborhood, in the city of La Paz. 

Hernán will use his loan money to refurbish his home, in particular the roof because it leaks.  In this way he will improve his own living conditions and those of his brother.  This is his first loan and the socio-economic analysis we have performed qualifies him favorably to receive a loan.

loans.use: To repair the roof of his home to avoid problems with leaks

loans.name: Kabera

texts.fr: N. Kabera est commerçant, agriculteur, et client d’ACB depuis 2010.  Il a 35 ans, il est marié, et il est né a Rwanda.  Il a 2 enfants entre 5 ans et 8 ans, un de qui va a l’école, et il a fini 6 ans d’école primaire.  Il va utiliser son prêt pour la réhabilitation de sa maison d’habitation ; acheter 10 triplex, 26 planches en bois pour plafond,  2 portes métalliques vitrées et guillage.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est d’avoir une belle maison dans son secteur en vue d’avoir une meilleure habitation.  Il voudrait la réhabilitation de sa maison, pour avoir une maison souhaitée par sa famille.  Il voudrait aussi développer le bien-être et bonne habitation de sa famille.  Pour gagner plus de revenue, N. est aussi élévateur de vaches.
texts.en: Ngabieye Kabera is an entrepreneur, farmer and client of ACV since 2010. He is 35 years old and married. He is born in Rwanda. He has two children, five and eight years of age, one of whom is in school. He has finished six years of primary school. He is going to use his loan for repairing the house he lives in by purchasing 10 sheets of triple ply-board, 26 wooden boards for his ceiling, two glazed metal doors and a fence. His strategy is to have a nice house in his neighborhood in order to improve his live conditions. He would like to repair his house to make it more suitable for his family’s needs. He would also like to be able to provide for the well-being and decent housing of his family. In order to increase his revenue, N. also raises cattle.

loans.use: Purchasing 10 sheets of triple ply-board, 26 wooden boards, two metal doors, etc

loans.name: Abel

texts.es:
Abel trabaja como chofer en el sindicato Pedro Domingo Murillo trufi 83 y su parada se encuentra en Ciudad Satélite de la Ciudad de El Alto. Trabaja hace diez años en el sindicato.  El señor Abel es casado y tiene un hijo, la esposa se dedica al comercio así apoyando en los gastos de la casa. Vive en casa de sus padres ya hace mucho tiempo, la casa esta ubicada en la zona de Villa Victoria de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo utilizara para la refacción de su movilidad y compra de línea de trabajo en el trufi 83. Es así como obtiene sus ingresos para su hogar.
Es su primer crédito y el análisis socioeconómico realizado lo califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Abel works as a driver.  He is a member of the Pedro Domingo Murillo Trufi 83 drivers' union and his stop is located in Ciudad Satélite, in the city of El Alto.  He has been working as a member of this union for ten years.  Mr. Abel is married and has one child.  His wife is a saleswoman and helps support him with their household expenses.  Abel has lived in his parents' home for a long time.  The house is located in Villa Victoria neighborhood, in the city of La Paz.

Abel will use his loan to refurbish his vehicle and to buy a permit which allows him to run his taxi on a particular route in the city.  This is how he makes income for his household.

This is Abel's first loan and the socio-economic analysis we have performed qualifies him favorably to obtain a loan.

loans.use: To maintain his taxi and to buy a permit which will allow him to run his taxi on a particular route in the city

loans.name: Haruni

texts.en: Haruni is 30 years old and married with two children.  He is able to send his children to school with the income he gets from selling electronic goods.  He has been running the business for three years and he has employed one person. He is grateful to Faulu Kenya for training him in business management.  This has helped him to improve his business. He has requested 60,000 Kes to buy televisions and mobile phones.

loans.use: To buy televisions and mobile phones

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es:
La señora Virginia trabaja como educadora en una guarderia de niños menores; este trabajo lo va realizando ya hace ocho años. Y aprovecha los fines de semana para vender comida ambulando en calles comerciales de la ciudad de La Paz, ya que no cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo el cual la abandono hace mucho tiempo a ella y sus dos hijos. La señora Virginia es separada y tiene dos hijos. Vive en alquiler ya hace quince años, la casa esta ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo utilizara para la compra de insumos para la preparación de comida (arroz, papa, carne, aji, etc.). Es así como obtiene sus ingresos para su hogar.
Es su primer crédito y el análisis socioeconómico realizado lo califica favorablemente y puede acceder  a un  crédito.
texts.en:
Virginia works as an educator in a nursery school. She has had this job for eight years. She takes advantage of her time during the weekends to sell food on the main streets in the city of La Paz. She does not have help from her husband because he abandoned her and their family a long time ago. Virginia is separated and she has two children. She has rented a home for 15 years. The home is located in the Pasankeri area in the city of La Paz.
The loan will be used to purchase ingredients used for preparing food (rice, potatoes, meat, chilies, etc.). This is how she makes an  income for her household. 
This is her first loan and she has received a favorable report from the socioeconomic analysis performed.

loans.use: to buy rice, potatoes, meat, chilies, onions, etc for her business selling food

loans.name: Esfuerzo Del Bicentenario Group

texts.es:
Jessica forma parte del Banco comunal “Esfuerzo del Bicentenario” conformado por 18 emprendedores, que se desempeñan en el rubro de comercio ambulante de diferentes productos,  pertenecientes a la ciudad de Curicó.
Jessica, quien en la foto se encuentra en la última fila, al lado derecho y viste polera negra, se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva: poleras, pantalones, polerones y ropa interior. Su negocio lo realiza en su casa desde hace 6 años, por lo que sus clientes frecuentes son sus vecinos y conocidos.
Jessica viaja a Santiago a comprar su mercadería, principalmente chalecos de temporada de invierno, poleras de verano, vestidos y traje de huaso para vender durante el período de Fiestas patrias (Fiesta costumbrista de Chile) y también compra pantalones, camisas y blusas para escolares para aprovechar de vender durante el inicio de clases en marzo. Jessica trabaja sola en este negocio, sin embargo recibe ayuda de su esposo, después de su jornada laboral, ya que él se desempeña como chofer de buses interurbanos.
Con este préstamo Jessica comprará ropa correspondiente a la temporada escolar, específicamente: pantalones, camisas, blusas, calcetas, polainas y buzos.
El sueño de Jessica es tener un local establecido en el centro de la ciudad de Curicó.
Ella está muy agradecida de Fondo Esperanza, le gusta mucho participar de las reuniones, debido a la unión y confianza generada en el grupo con los otros emprendedores, es por esto que además es delegada del Banco comunal. En cuanto al financiamiento que recibe por medio de Fondo Esperanza, ha sido un gran aporte para su negocio, ya que con este ha podido invertir dinero más y aumentar sus ingresos.
Curicó se ubica en la región del Maule, zona centro del país. El clima de Curicó es de tipo mediterráneo y es considerado como uno de los más agradables del país. Se caracteriza además por su cultura en torno al vino y sus alrededores de belleza natural.  A pesar de que la fuerza de trabajo se ha  incrementado, esta zona sigue siendo, según el último censo, una de las más pobres del país.
texts.en:
Jessica is a member of the "Esfuerzo del Bicentenario” community bank which has 18 entrepreneurial members who work as door-to-door salespeople, selling a range of different products.  They all live in the city of Curicó.

Jessica, who in the photo is in the back row, on the right, wearing a black top, sells new clothes: t-shirts, pants and underwear.  She has been running her business from her home for 6 years.  Her regular customers are her neighbors and acquaintances.

Jessica travels to Santiago to buy her merchandise which is mainly winter jackets, summer t-shirts, dresses and 'trajes de huaso' (traditional outfits) to sell during the 'Fiestas Patrias' period (Chilean independence day celebrations).  She also buys school pants, shirts and blouses to sell during the back-to-school period in March.  Jessica works on her own in this business but she receives help from her husband when he has finished his work each day.  He works as an inter-city bus driver.

Jessica will use this loan to buy clothes for the back-to-school season, specifically pants, shirts, blouses, underpants, gaiters and sweaters.

Jessica's dream is to own an established store in the center of Curicó.  She is very grateful to Fondo Esperanza.  She very much enjoys taking part in her community bank's meetings because of the unity and trust that exists between all the members of her group.  Jessica is also her group's representative.  The loans that Jessica receives through Fondo Esperanza have been a great support to her in her business since they have enabled her to invest more money and increase her income.

Curicó is located in El Maule region, in the center of the country.  It has a Mediterranean-type climate and is considered one of the nicest in the country.  The city is known for its wine production and the natural beauty of its surrounding area.  In spite of the fact that the workforce has increased in this area, it continues to be, according to the last census, one of the poorest in the country.

loans.use: To buy school uniforms: pants, shirts, blouses, underpants, sweaters

loans.name: Pedro Jose

texts.es: Pedro José tiene 36 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de panadería. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio, siempre se ha dedicado a este medio de vida ya que vive muy pendiente de lo que sus clientes le solicitan. El ha sido una persona muy trabajadora, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo pues desde pequeño empezó con este negocio ya que su familia era quien se hacía cargo del negocio, con el paso del tiempo es que logro obtener su negocio. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de harina, queso, mantequilla, azúcar, entre otros productos necesarios para la elaboración.
texts.en:
36-year old Pedro José runs a bakery. He’s owned this business for more than five years and has always made a living this way. What he bakes depends on what his customers ask for. 

Pedro is a hardworking person with two young children to support. Ever since he was young he has helped in a bakery as his parents also ran one. As time passed, he managed to obtain a bakery of his own. He is seeking a loan to buy flour, cheese, butter, sugar and other ingredients needed to make his products.

loans.use: to buy ingredients

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.es:
Benjamín vive en la casa alquilada de sus padres cuyo domicilio esta ubicado en la zona de Miraflores de la ciudad de La Paz. El préstamo lo destinara para la compra de equipos modernos ya que el señor presta el servicio de amplificación para eventos sociales. Es su principal fuente de ingreso para su manutención. Benjamín es soltero.
 
Es el octavo crédito con Impro, y su historial de pagos es impecable.
texts.en:
Benjamín lives in a house rented from his parents located in the Miraflores area of the city of La Paz. The loan will be used to buy modern equipment for the DJ service that he provides for social events. This is Benjamín’s sole source of income. He is single.

This is his eighth loan with Kiva partner Impro, and his history of making repayments is impeccable.

loans.use: to buy modern equipment for his DJ business

loans.name: Ajwang

texts.en: Ajwang is 28 years old, married and has a five-month-old child.  He works as a mechanic to earn a living.  He started the business after graduating from college eight years ago.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has developed a culture of saving his money.  He aspires to own a garage in the future.  Being a member of Lenana Road group in Faulu Kenya, he has been guaranteed a loan of 50,000 Kes by the members. With the loan, he will buy a spraying machine.

loans.use: To buy a spraying machine

loans.name: Blanca Azucena

texts.es:
la señora Blanca Azucena O. es una mujer honrada, trabajadora y dedicada a su negocio propio, que es venta de abarroteria en general, su negocio esta ubicado en el mercado Concepcion de la ciudad de Choluteca, ahi vende sus productos a un gran numero de personas que la visitan de muchas aldeas cercanas, Blanca empieza a atender en su negocio desde las 7 de la manaña hasta las 5 de la tarde todos los dias y asi de esta manera poder satifacer todas las necesidades de sus clientes.
Trabaja muy fuerte cada dia para salir adelante y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mercaderia para surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
Señora Blanca Azucena O. is an honest, hardworking woman who has her own business selling groceries and other supplies to the many people who visit her store from nearby villages. The store is located in the Concepcion market in the town of Choluteca. 

Blanca tries to be open from 7am to 5pm every day to attend to the needs of her customers. She works very hard each day to get ahead and have a better standard of living. The loan will be used to buy more merchandise for her store.

loans.use: to buy corn, beans, oil etc to stock her store

loans.name: Responsables De Jalpa Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Responsables de Jalpa, porque las señoras desean hacerle honor al nombre del grupo. Esta ubicado en el Estado de México. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes. Teresa López S. es integrante del grupo. Tiene 41 años, estudio la secundaria, es ama de casa, tiene en total 2 hijas. Ella se dedica a la cria y venta de pollos, negocio que inicio hace 3 años. Solicita el prestamo para comprar mas pollos. Al momento de solicitar este prestamo se siente feliz porque tiene dinero para invertir en su negocio y comprometida porque argumenta que el prestamo conlleva una gran responsabilidad. Este crédito lo quiere para fortalecer la actividad que realiza y con ello obtener ingresos que ayuden a la economía de su familia. También espera engrandecer su negocio y poder vender en otras comunidades cercanas.
texts.en:
This group is called Las Pimpoyas.  They chose this name in honor of feminine beauty, which is considered to be the natural essence of life.  This municipality belongs to the state of Hidalgo in Mexico.  

This group is called “Responsables de Jalpa” (Responsible Ones From Jalpa) because the women wished to distinguish the name of the group.  They are located in the state of Mexico.  The group is comprised of nine members.

Teresa López S. is a member of the group.  She is 41 years old, has a high school education, is a housewife, and has two daughters.  She raises and sells chickens, a  business she started  three years ago.  She is requesting the loan to buy more chickens.  

She is happy at the time of requesting this loan because she has money to invest in her business.  She asserts that she is committed because the loan comes with a great responsibility.  She wants the loan to strengthen her business activity.  That way she will get income that helps her family financially.  Also, she hopes to expand her business and to be able to sell in other nearby communities.

loans.use: To raise and sell chickens

loans.name: Joseline

texts.en:
Joseline is 26 years old and has 2 children who are 6 ½ and 1 ½ years old. Her husband is a driver and they both aim at raising their children in such a way that they will not lack anything. 

Joseline sells second-hand clothes and she has been selling clothes for over 4 years. Joseline is requesting a loan in order to buy more second-hand clothes. With the profits she plans to continue with her house construction.

loans.use: Buying additional inventory of second-hand clothes

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Antonia tiene 26 años de edad, con 2 hijos menores de edad. Su pareja trabaja en Argentina como constructor de obras. Ambos se apoyan mutuamente.
Ella es vendedora ambulante de ropas, tiene como sueño mejorar su calidad de vida por lo que necesita invertir en su negocio y así aumentar sus ingresos.
Tiene casa propia, su lucha diaria es para el sustento de sus hijos y así poder ahorrar para la educación de los mismos.
texts.en:
Antonia is 26 and has two young children.  Her partner works in Argentina as a construction worker.  They provide each other mutual support.  

Antonia is a mobile clothing vendor.  Her biggest dream is to improve her quality of life, so she needs to invest in her business in order to grow her income.  

She has her own house, and her daily challenge is supporting her children so she can save up for their education.

loans.use:
Compra de jeans, remeras, shorts y otros
To buy jeans, t-shirts, shorts, and other merchandise

loans.name: Santos Evelia

texts.es: Santos Evelia tiene 37 años. Es madre soltera y tiene 3 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Su actividad es la venta de cosméticos, desde hace más de 10 años, pues con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado salir adelante con su negocio. Inicio este medio de vida con muy pocos productos que son necesarios ya que sus clientes le solicitan una gran variedad. Sabe que todos los días tiene que levantarse temprano para empezar a ofrecer sus productos. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de polvos, lápiz labial, brillos, sombras entre otras cosas. A pesar de enfrentar desafíos como mantener el negocio en estos días tan difíciles.
texts.en: Santos Evelia is 37.  She's a single mother, and is responsible for her two young children.  She's been in business selling cosmetics for 10 years.  With a great deal of effort she has been able to make her business a success.  She started out with very few products, which she needed because customers request a wide variety of items. She knows she needs to get up early every day to start selling her products.  She'll use her loan to buy powders, lipstick, lip gloss, eye shadow, etc., despite the challenges she faces during these tough times, like running a business.

loans.use: capital de trabajo

loans.name: José Del Carmen

texts.es:
José tiene 31 años de edad, es soltero y reside junto a su familia en el  distrito de San José, característico por ser un lugar donde resalta la actividad de la pesca, el cual se encuentra ubicado a más de 30 minutos de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la Región Lambayeque. 

Se dedica desde hace mucho tiempo a la venta de pescado fresco en un puesto en el mercado de San José, algunas veces vende su pescado en un lugar ubicado a orillas del mar esto ocurre cuando la demanda aumenta. Con los ingresos que percibe se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia y de solventar su economía diaria.

José desea adquirir equipos para que su faena sea más rápida y de esta manera tener mayor cantidad de pescado para la venta percibiendo mayores ganancias, lo que le permita cumplir con unas de sus aspiraciones que es llegar a exportar su producto. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles.

Él es una persona que siempre vela por el bienestar y desarrollo de sus padres. Su mayor anhelo es mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is 31 years old, single, and lives with his family in San José district which is noted for the fact that many people there work in the fishing business.  It is located 30 minutes from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of Lambayeque region.

José has been selling fresh fish from a stall in San José market for a long time.  Sometimes he sells his fish down by the seashore.  He does this when his demand increases.  He uses the income he makes in his business to get his family ahead and cover his daily expenses.

José would like to buy fishing tackle so that he can do his job more quickly and, in this way, have more fish to sell.  This will make him more profits and enable him to fulfil one of his dreams which is to export his fish.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

José is a person who is always looking out for his parents' well-being and progress.  His greatest wish is to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: To buy fishing tackle

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.fr:
Madame Charlotte S. est une femme de 59 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 07 enfants. Elle a aussi en charge ces trois petits enfants . Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SANGHE DOUKA depuis le 03 mai 1997. 

Elle fait de l'embouche bovine et caprine. Elle pratique cette activité depuis avant son adhésion dans le Banc Villageois. 

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra d'acheter une paire de bœufs et des chèvres à emboucher 

Elle participe très souvent aux dépenses quotidiennes de la famille et paye les fournitures scolaires pour ses petits enfants/
texts.en:
Mrs. Charlotte S. is a 59-year old woman. She is married and the mother of seven. She also has three grandchildren in her care. She has been  a member of the Banc Villageois of Sanghe Douka since May 3, 1997.

She raises cows and goats. She has been  doing this line of work before joining Banc Villageois. Her new loan will allow her to purchase a couple of cows and goats to fatten for resale. She constantly contributes to the family budgets and pays for the school supplies for her grandchildren.

loans.use: Purchasing cows and goats

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: Tomas tiene 39 años esta es la primera vez que realiza financiamiento, pues ha sido muy importante para su negocio.  La actividad económica a la que se dedica es ofrecer los servicios de carpintería, hace más de 20 años que se dedica a esta actividad, la mayoría de sus clientes siempre le están solicitando diferentes elaboraciones de muebles mesa, sillas, camas entre otros productos. Este crédito es para la compra de junco, maque, herramientas entre otras cosas.  El desea proporcionarle mejoras a su local del negocio y mantenerlo siempre activo.
texts.en: Tomas is 39 years old and this is the first time he has taken out a loan. He is doing so because it is very important for his business. He works in the carpentry trade, and has offered these services for the past 20 years. Most of his customers are always asking him to make various pieces furniture, including tables, chairs, beds and other items. This loan is to buy reeds, lacquer, tools and other things. He wants to make improvements to his business premises and keep it running.

loans.use: working capital

loans.name: Twikuremubukene B Group

texts.fr: Léonile Ndagijemariya est agricultrice, et client d’ACB depuis 2010.  Elle a 50 ans, elle est mariée, et née a Rwanda.  Elle a 8 enfants entre 5 ans et 25 ans, 5 de qui vont à l’école, et elle a fini 6 ans d’école primaire.  Elle va utiliser son prêt pour acheter 1 pompe pour l’insecticide, et 2 paquets de tomates pour les cultiver.  Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire et d’acheter les matériels de technicité, augmenter l’espace de l’agriculture en vue de réaliser beaucoup de récoltes dans son secteur.  Elle voudrait devenir une grande agricultrice dans de district de Rubavu, assurer le bien être de sa famille, et payer les frais d’études pour ses enfants.  Pour gagner plus de revenue, Léonile est aussi élévatrice de poules et chèvres.
texts.en:
Léonile Ndagijemariya is a farmer and member of ACB since 2010. She is 50 years old, married, and was born in Rwanda. She has eight children ranging in age from 5 to 25 years old, five of whom attend school. She completed six years of primary school. 

She will use her loan to buy a pump for insecticide, and two packs of tomatoes seeds. Her business growth strategy is to buy specialized equipment and increase her cultivable area in order to achieve a high volume of crops. She would like to become a great farmer in the Rubavu district, ensure her family’s well-being, and pay for her children’s tuition. 

As a sideline, to increase her revenue, Léonile also works as a chicken and goat breeder.

loans.use: To purchase a pump and two packs of tomato seeds

loans.name: Lety Azucena

texts.es:
la señora Lety Azucena C. O. tiene 32 años de edad, vive en el barrio Nueva Esperanza de la ciudad de Choluteca y se dedica a la venta de desayunos, almuerzos, cenas y golosinas, tiene su propio restaurante, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años.
tiene muchos clientes ya que sus comidas son sabrosas e higienicas, es visitado por varios turistas ya que su negocio se encuentra en la calle panamericana que conduce a la frontera de Guasaule (Honduras-Nicaragua)
todos los dias se levanta temprano para preparar sus alimentos y su negocio lo abre a las 10 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar comida para preparar sus sabrosos platos de cada dia.
texts.en:
Lety Azucena C. O. is 32 and lives in the Nueva Esperanza neighborhood in the city of Choluteca.  She earns her living selling breakfast, lunch, dinner, and sweets.  She's got her own restaurant, which she's been running for 3 years.  

Lety has a lot of customers because her meals are delicious and clean.  She is frequented by a variety of tourists because she's located on Panamericana Street, which runs along the border of Guasaule (Honduras-Nicaragua).   

Every day Lety gets up early to prepare the food and get the restaurant ready.  She's open from 10 in the morning to 11 at night.  She plans to use her loan to buy food to make the tasty dishes she offers on daily basis.

loans.use: To buy meat, tortillas, butter, oil, vegetables, beans, rice, coffee, soft drinks, water, fish, shrimp, shellfish, chicken, bread, and ice

loans.name: Betty

texts.es: Betty, de 31 años, es una madre de familia muy responsable, vive en su casa propia, junto a su esposo y su hijo. Desde hace 9 años Betty, esta trabajadora mujer se dedica a la venta de abarrotes, en su bodega situado en el ambiente de su casa, además los días viernes y sábados se dedica a trabajar en un spa. Esta muy satisfecha, pues ambas actividades le genera buenas ganancias, además cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de su hermana, en la que atiende su bodega cuando ella asiste al spa. Ella trabaja desde muy temprano y para abastecerse con más mercadería su negocio, realiza sus pedidos de los proveedores que acuden a su tienda y a veces lo consigue en el mismo centro comercial de la ciudad, de ese modo apoya a los gastos de su hogar y la educación de su hijo. Por ello tiene pensado para el futuro ampliar e incrementar su bodega, construir su casa, y  brindarle una  profesión a su hijo. Es el 16avo crédito con MFP, demostrando compromiso y liderazgo en su grupo de lo que los integrantes de su asociación, están muy contentos de su gestión. Betty compra mercadería necesaria para su negocio, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará productos comestibles para abastecer más su bodega.
texts.en: Betty is 31 years old and is a very responsible wife and mother. She lives in her own house with her husband and son. For 9 years, Betty has been working hard by selling groceries from the small shop located in her home. In addition, she works in a spa every Friday and Saturday. She is very satisfied, as both jobs earn her a good living, and she has the unconditional support of her sister, who looks after her shop when she is working at the spa. She works from very early in the morning and, in order to stock her business with more goods, she orders from suppliers who visit her in the shop. Sometimes she even picks up stock from the shopping centre in the city. This is how she covers her household costs and pays for her son's education. For this reason, in the future she intends to expand and increase the size of her shop, build her own house, and enable her son to have a career. It is her 16th loan with MFP, and she has proven her commitment and leadership within her group, so the members of her association are very happy with her management skills. Betty buys the goods she needs for her business, so with the loan she is requesting she will buy grocery products in order to better stock her shop.

loans.use: To buy grocery products to stock her shop.

loans.name: Beato Roque González Group

texts.es:
El comité está ubicado en la ciudad de Carapeguá en el Barrio Virgen del Rosario.
El Comité esta integrado por 16 señoras muy trabajadoras y activas, se encuentran en el primer ciclo.
Este grupo es muy unido y trabaja en forma conjunta, ellas no presentan inconvenientes con el pago de sus cuotas ni en el relacionamiento entre ellas.
La sra. Marilina R. ha trabajado desde hace muchos años vendiendo comestibles en un almacén, buscando un poco más de apoyo solicitó a la Fundación Paraguaya un crédito, para fomentar através de él sus ingresos familiares y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
This committee is located in Virgen del Rosario neighborhood, in the city of Carapeguá.  It has 16 female members who are all very hard-working and active ladies.  They are in their first loan cycle.

This group is very united and works together.  The women have no problems in making their loan repayments nor do they have any problems in their  relationships with each other.

Marilina R. has been selling food in a store for many years.  She was looking for a little more support and so requested a loan from Fundación Paraguaya which would boost her family income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: To buy dairy products, milk, sugar, noodles, yerba, fruit, vegetables, eggs, meat, flour, soda, oil, etc.

loans.name: Gloria Lizeth

texts.es:
la joven Gloria Lizeth H. tiene 25 años de edad, es una mujer emprendedora, tiene su propio negocio el cual es la venta de carnes, embutidos, pollo, chorizos de cerdo y pollo, huevos.
actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años, distribuye su producto en San Marcos, El Triunfo, San Francisco, Orocuina, aqui en estos lugares tiene una buena cantidad de clientes que le hacen pedidos todas las semanas.
Gloria todos los dias se levanta a las 4 de la mañana para ordenar su carnes y salir a venderlas y lograr cubrir con todas las necesidades de sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de carnes, pollo, chorizos, huevos.
su meta es seguir creciendo con su negocio y tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gloria is 25 years old. She's an enterprising young women who has her own business selling meat, sausages, chicken, pork and chicken sausages, and eggs. She has been doing this for 3 years, and she sells her goods in San Marcos, El Triunfo, San Francisco, and Orocuina. She has a good number of customers in these places who place orders with her every week. 
Gloria gets up at 4 in the morning everyday to order her meat and head out to sell it and meet the needs of her customers. 
She will use the loan to buy meat, chicken, sausages, and eggs.
Her goal is to keep building her business and to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy chicken, bologna, sausage, ground beef, eggs

loans.name: Diouma

texts.fr:
Madame DIOUMA F. est une femme de 50 ans. Elle est veuve et a la garde de 11 enfants. Elle fait partie du Banc Villageois de SANGHE DOUKA depuis le 03 mai 1997. Elle a 26 fois reçu de crédits auprès de CAURIE-MF et n'a jamais eu de problème de remboursement


Elle développe un petit commerce comme activité principale. Parallèlement elle fait un élevage de porcs, de chèvre et de moutons. 

Son nouveau crédit lui permettra de mieux développer son activité afin de prétendre à des bénéfices qui l'aideront à prendre en charge sa famille. 

Son objectif est d'assurer la prise en charge de sa famille et à subvenir à ses besoins personnels
texts.en:
F. DIOUM is a 50 years old lady. She is widowed and has custody of 11 children. She is a member of the communal bank SANGHA DOUKAS since May 3, 1997. She received 26 loans from CAURIE-MF and always paid back on schedule. 
She has developed a small business as her main activity. At the same time, she also raises pigs, goats and sheep. 
This new loan will allow her to improve her business and increase her profits, which will help her to support her family. 
Her objective is to ensure the care of her family and to meet their personal needs.

loans.use: Purchase of fabrics and kitchenware

loans.name: Adjoa

texts.en:
Adjoa Y. cooks rice and serves it with tomato sauce at Abbrem Agona near Abura, Cape Coast. She has been cooking food for sale for 11 years. She is married and has three children. Her husband repairs faulty televisions. She assists her husband in providing the basic needs of the family, such as food, clothing and shelter. Her loan will be added to her initial capital to buy other foodstuffs to cook to meet the demand of her customers. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to build a cafeteria.

In this picture, Adjoa is dishing out some of the cooked rice. To her right is the tomato sauce.

loans.use: buy other foodstuffs to cook

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa, de 52 años, es una mujer tierna y dedicada, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su esposo Julián de 56 años  y su hijo Michael de 30 años. Por muchos años se dedica en la venta de comida generalmente los fines de semana. Por ello, que estos días esta muy ajetreada, ya que una vez que haya cocinado sus platillos criollos y deliciosos, los envuelve con sus manteles relucientes y limpios, y los transporta hasta la loza deportiva, siendo ahí  su punto de venta, y es muy  apreciada por todos los jóvenes deportistas. Y con su esposo trabaja los otros días, ya que tienen 3 carros de segundo uso, de los cuales su esposo conduce uno, su hijo otro y el último lo alquila. Por ello, Tomasa es la administradora y el buen funcionamiento de sus vehículos, siendo su mayor prioridad en adelante realizar el mantenimiento de todos ellos, de este modo no sufrirá averías frecuentes en el trabajo. Es el 2do crédito con MFP, y se compromete en pagar sus cuotas puntualmente pues no quiere defraudar a los integrantes de su banco comunal, quienes inicialmente confiaron en ella para integrarle en el grupo. De obtener el crédito que solicita, pagará las papeleta impuesta por el policía de transito, para que no trabaje de manera informal su hijo, siendo por las noches.
texts.en: Tomasa, 52, is a sweet and dedicated woman, she lives in a house she owns with her husband Julian, 56 and their son Michael, 30.  For many years she has sold food generally on the weekends. Lately she has been really busy, because now when she is done cooking her creole and delicious meals, she packs them in clean and bright cloths and takes them to the sport complex, being that her point of sale and she is appreciated by all the young athletes.  She works with her husband every day because they have three second hand cars, of which her husband drives one, her son another one and the third one is rented.  Tomasa is the administrator for the good performance of the vehicles, being her priority to give them maintenance and this way avoid breakdowns.  This is the second loan with MFP and she commits to make her repayments punctually because she doesn't want to let down the members of the community bank, who trusted her to join the group. With the loan requested, she will pay for the ticket given by the transit police, so that her son doesn't work informally during the night.

loans.use: Pay transit ticket to avoid problems and continue to work in transportation.

loans.name: Ekua

texts.en: Ekua M. is married to a driver. She has been through junior high school.  Ekua sells hair and skin products at Abbrem Agona, which is near Abura in Cape Coast, where she has been for three years. Ekua is requesting the loan to purchase more hair and skin products for resale. She plans to reinvest her additional income.

loans.use: purchase more hair and skin products for resale

loans.name: Deysi Janet

texts.es:
Deysi tiene 30 años D. edad, es casada y resiD. junto a su esposo y sus cuatro hijos en el caserio Cruce D. Vega ubicado en el distrito D. TambogranD., una zona agrícoL. que se encuentra situada en L. provincia D. Piura, en L. región del mismo nombre, a más D. cuatro horas D. L. ciudad D. Chiclayo, capital D. L. región Lambayeque.

ElL. cuenta con un pequeño establecimiento en su vivienda, allí ofrece en venta a sus clientes y vecinos diversas golosinas. Adicionalmente comercializa productos D. belleza por catálogo entre los clientes que llegan a su tienda, actividad que realiza hace seis años. El negocio cuenta con muy buena acogida, gracias a L. buena atención que Deysi ofrece. Esta actividad le hace sentir bastante activa y con las ganancias que obtiene se encarga D. sacar adelante a su familia.

Deysi desea ampliar su negocio con L. compra D. más productos, ya que desea en esta temporada aumentar sus ventas diarias. Por ello ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 700 nuevos soles.
texts.en:
Deysi is 30 years old, is married, and lives with her husband and their four children in the small village of Cruce D. Vega, which is located in the TambogranD. district. This is an agricultural zone in the Piura province, which is in the region with the same name, more than 4 hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.
She runs a small business from her home. From here, she sells candies to her neighbors and other customers. She also sells beauty products from a catalog to the customers who come to her store. She has been doing this for 6 years. The business has been very well received thanks to the good service that Deysi provides. This business makes her feel active, and the income that she makes helps her family to move forward in life.
Deysi wants to grow her business and buy more products - this season she wants to increase her daily sales. For this reason, she is requesting a loan of $275 from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To purchase more beauty products.

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi M. is married and has 13 dependents. Her husband is a farmer. She has received junior high education. Esi sells cooked rice and beans (popularly called red-red) at Abbrem Agona, which is near Abura in Cape Coast. Esi uses her income to assist her husband to see to the well-being of her home. She will be using the loan to buy more rice and beans and other ingredients to cook in a larger quantity for sale. Esi anticipates reinvesting her new profit. In the picture, she is serving the cooked beans.

loans.use: buy more rice and beans and other ingredients

loans.name: Onesphore

texts.fr: Onésphore N. est Pasteur dans une Eglise locale de Rubavu, province de l’ouest, il est âgée de 53 ans, il a 4 enfants, entre 27 et 14 ans, il est né en RDC, son niveau d’éducation est  2 ans de l’école secondaire. Il une très bonne expérience de remboursement des prêts car, le prêt qu’il sollicite est le troisième, il va payer le minerval et va acheter le matériel scolaire de l’année académique 2011, pour ses enfants. Sa stratégie pour la croissance de l’affaire est de continuer de payer le crédit à temps, pour solliciter d’autres et pouvoir aider ses enfants à terminer leurs études. Il préparer l’avenir de enfants car le bon avenir des ses enfants est sa propre bon avenir a l’âge de vieillesse.
texts.en: Onésphore N. is the pastor of a local church in Rubavu, a province in the west. He is 53 years old, has four children between 14 and 27 years of age and was born in the Democratic Republic of the Congo. He attended school but left after two years of secondary school. He has a good experience with loans since he is now requesting a third loan to pay school fees and buy school materials for his children for the 2011 academic year. His strategy is to continue repaying loans on time, in order to be able to request further loans and to be able to help his children finish their studies. He is preparing his children's future since the success of their future will decide his own future in his old age.

loans.use: Payment of school fees and purchase of school materials for his children

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.fr:
Charlottes G. est une femme de 64 ans. Elle est veuve et vit avec ses 07 enfants et ses 05 petits enfants Elle est membre du Banc Villageois de SANGHE DOUKA depuis son inauguration le 03 mai 1997. Elle y a reçu 26 prêts qu'elle a tourjours remboursés sans difficulté.

Elle fait un petit commerce de poissons fumés et de l'élevage de porcs et de chèvres. Elle pratique cette activité depuis plus d'une décennie. 

Avec son nouveau prêt elle aura la possibilité de renforcer son activité 

Son objectif est de subvenir à ses besoins personnels et d'assurer la prise en charge de la famille.
texts.en:
Charlottes G., age 64, is a widow who lives with her seven children and five grandchildren. She's been a member of the "Banc Villageois" of Sanghe Douka since it was inaugurated on May 3rd, 1997. She already benefited from 26 loans, which she all repaid without problems.

For more than ten years, she's been selling smoked fish and raising porks and goats. With her new loan, she will be able to bolster her business. Her goal is to provide for herself and her family.

loans.use: To buy smoked fish, pigs, and goats

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi A. is married and has seven dependents. Her husband is a farmer. Esi sells provisions and charcoal at Abura, Cape Coast. Esi uses the income she makes from her sales to help her husband to feed and educate her children. Esi will use the loan to acquire other provisions requested by her customers. With the new profits from her expanded business, Esi plans to build another shop.

loans.use: acquire other provisions requested by her customers

loans.name: Balam Nah De Carrillo Group

texts.es: La señora    María Magdalena B. K.,  “Doña Magda”,  tiene  40 años de edad , ella es miembro del  grupo  Balam Nah de Carrillo , cuyo significado es  Casa del  Jaguar  en  lengua  maya . El grupo está ubicado  en la comunidad de  Carrillo Puerto.  María Magdalena  cuenta con  un cuarto que le sirve tanto de vivienda,  como de  tienda, lugar donde habitan  su  esposo  Mauricio  y  sus  3  hijos:  Nacho  de 21 años, (persona con capacidades  diferentes ), Yuridia  de 12 años,  y el pequeño  Lisandro  de 7 años,  en edad  escolar.   Necesita  construir  otro cuarto para utilizarlo como  tienda  para la venta  sus  productos naturistas,   negocio que  inició hace 3 años  mediante la venta por catálogo , actualmente María  ya cuenta con los productos  en su casa , de modo que esto hace más atractivo su negocio, al contar con una  tienda  para  sus clientas. Actualmente  ,Magdalena , se siente  comprometida  con su  labor de madre  y con su negocio,  su prioridad  es   ganar  dinero para seguir llevando  a su hijo Nacho  a  sus  tratamientos de rehabilitación.  Por lo que nos solicita  crédito, para llevar a cabo  sus  planes  de  ampliar su negocio  ofreciéndole   una mejor calidad de vida  a su familia.
texts.en:
María Magdalena B. K., “Miss Magda” is 40 years old.  She is a member of the Balam Nah de Carrillo group.  The name means House of the Jaguar in Mayan.  The group is located in the Carrillo Puerto community.

María Magdaleana has a room, which serves as a home as much as a store.  This is where she lives with her husband, Mauricio, and their three children.  Nacho is 21 (he has special needs), Yuridia is 12, and little Lisandra is seven and school age.

She needs to build another room to use as a store for her natural products sales.  She started this business three years ago selling by catalog.  María currently has the products in her house.  Having a store would mA. her business more attractive to her customers.

Magdalena currently feels committed to her work as a mother and to her business.  Her priority is to earn money in order to continue taking her son, Nacho, for his rehabilitation treatments.  That is why she is asking us for a loan, to be able to carry out her plans to expand her store and to present a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: Improvements to her business

loans.name: Las Esmeraldas Group

texts.es: L. Sra. Amelia, tiene 3 hijos  es conviviente  y lleva trabajando con Edaprospo desD. hace 1 año, Amelia  es tesorera del grupo “Las Esmeraldas”, grupo conformado por 9 amigas. Amelia  trabaja vendiendo productos D. belleza  desD. hace 10 años y a su vez también venD. gaseosa, cerveza y los domingos comida, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a  logrado mejorar L. calidad D. vida D. sus hijos, brindándoles educación  y con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería y así empezar a vender ropa  . Sabemos que Amelia  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Amelia is in a common-law marriage and has three children.  She has been working with Edaprospo for one year.  Amelia is the treasurer of the “Las Esmeraldas” (The Emeralds) group, which is comprised of nine friends.

Amelia has worked selling beauty products for ten years.  She also sells soft drinks, beer, and food on Sundays.  Thanks to her effort and dedication, she has managed to improve her children’s quality of life and to proviD. them with an education.

In order to keep growing, she has requested a new loan to buy merchandise and start selling clothes.  We know that Amelia will reach her goals with a lot of work and effort.  The loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: comprar mercaderia

loans.name: Lilia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SEÑOR PASION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Lilia; ella tiene 34 años de edad, casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio tienda de abarrotes ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche entre otros productos más, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de seguir adelante por su familia ,a la vez la socia tiene su negocio de restaurante donde brinda el servicio de cena ya que solo lo abre por las tardes y deja en su tienda algún familiar que le ayude ,de esta forma la socia sale adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de mas mercadería  para su tienda de abarrotes y para la compra de insumos para su restaurante.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Lilia is a member of the “SEÑOR PASION” community bank which is located in Urubamba district, in Urubamba province, in Cusco department.

Lilia is 34 years old, married, and has 3 children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her grocery store business where she sells essentials such as rice, sugar, milk, etc.  She is a very happy person who has a great desire to get her family ahead in life.  Lilia also owns a restaurant business where she serves dinner.  She opens the restaurant in the afternoons, leaving a family member to look after the store.  In this way, she gets ahead.

Lilia is requesting a loan to buy more merchandise for her grocery store and to buy supplies for her restaurant.  She is happy to be receiving the loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise for her grocery store and to buy supplies for her restaurant

loans.name: Ama

texts.en:
Ama A. sells soap, shea butter, plastic containers and other items in Abbrem Agona, which is near Abura in Cape Coast. She is a widow taking care of four children. Ama has been in this trade for six years. She is responsible for the general welfare of her children. Her loan will be used to buy more soap and other products to expand her business. She hopes to use the new profits from her business to provide a meaningful education for her children.

The picture displays some of the items she sells. To her right is a display of some brightly coloured sponges. The yellow substance in the pan is shea butter.

loans.use: buy more soap and other products to expand her business

loans.name: Mirtha Beatriz

texts.en: Ms. Mirtha Gonzalez is single and has a 5-year-old daughter.  She used to be an employee of a jewelry store, where she worked for several years; that's where she got the idea of becoming an independent worker, and 10 years ago she did.   Now Mirtha buys and sells silver and golden jewelry, and she is well established in the business.  Also, due to customer requests, she is going into the women's shoe business as well, in which she is doing great.  in the near future she is planning in opening a small general store business in her house.

loans.use: Jewelry and shoes for women

loans.name: Adama

texts.fr:
Adama S. est une femme de 40 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 08 enfants. Elle a une ancienneté de 04 ans et demi dans le Banc Villageois de SANGHE DOUKA et y a reçu 09 prêts.

Elle fait de l'embouche ovine et caprine. Elle pratique cette activité depuis plus de 10 ans. Et comme activité secondaire elle fait la vente de beignets. 

Son crédit lui permettra de mieux développer son activité en augmentant les têtes de bêtes à emboucher. 

Avec le bénéfices qu'elle réalise elle parvient à satisfaire les besoins de sa famille
texts.en:
Adama S., age 40, is married and the mother of eight children. She's been a member of the "Banc Villageois" of SANGHE DOUKA for four-and-a-half years, and already benefited from nine loans.

She's been raising sheep and goats for more than ten years. She also sells doughnuts as a secondary business. Her loan will enable her to better expand her business, by increasing the number of animals she raises.

With her profits, she manages to provide for herself and her family.

loans.use: To buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Esi

texts.en: Esi N. is married to a farmer and has 5 dependents. She sells salted fish, canned beef, spices and other items, peddling her wares from one area to another in Abbrem Agona, which is near Abura, Cape Coast. Esi uses her income to assist her husband with household expenses. Esi will add the loan to her capital to expand her business by buying more food items to sell. The profit she hopes to get will be used to build a shop.

loans.use: buying more food items to sell

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “ SEÑOR PASION”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Luz Marina; ella tiene 34 años de edad, conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas,a la vez la socia es docente del nivel primario del colegio nacional de Urubamba, la socia es una persona bien alegre y optimista y de esta forma la socia saca  a su familia adelante.

La socia solicita el préstamo para la compra de alimento como pasto,maíz entre otros mas para a sus animales y también para la compra de mas animales.
